.
Application of 38 CFR 3.551(h) When Initial Admission Is for Other Than Rehabilitation
When a current-law pension recipient is admitted to VA-furnished nursing home care for purposes other than rehabilitation, the provisions of
38 CFR 3.551(h)
apply if, at a later time during the continuous period of care, the primary purpose of care becomes that of rehabilitation.
